about_the_game:
What could be better than admiring your own dollar in a wonderful forest? Or maybe it's even better to watch the beautiful swaying of your dollar in the fresh breeze?

Your dollar will not run away, no one will steal it - it will always be waiting for you in the same place!

Turn your ordinary, everyday dollar - into a DOLLAR that will never leave you, that you can endlessly admire and, of course, spend all your free time with it!

Press W, Dude. The dollar has you!

P.S.
Hey, if your friend still doesn't have his own dollar - well, you know what to do!
detailed_description:
What could be better than admiring your own dollar in a wonderful forest? Or maybe it's even better to watch the beautiful swaying of your dollar in the fresh breeze?

Your dollar will not run away, no one will steal it - it will always be waiting for you in the same place!

Turn your ordinary, everyday dollar - into a DOLLAR that will never leave you, that you can endlessly admire and, of course, spend all your free time with it!

Press W, Dude. The dollar has you!

P.S.
Hey, if your friend still doesn't have his own dollar - well, you know what to do!

name: One Dollar Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 760
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is, in truth, the best simulator of 2020! This simulator will transform your dollar from your ordinary and everyday world - into a DOLLAR of the world of beauty and harmony!
